worried_greeting.text: Elena paces nervously, a letter clutched in her hands. 'Oh, you're here. I have this letter that needs delivering, but I understand you're busy. It's important to me, though perhaps not as urgent as others you carry.'

choices.text: "Let me help you with something quick."
"Perhaps we could work out a better position in my queue..."
"Don't worry, I'll make sure it gets delivered on time."

understanding_farewell.text: Elena nods, forcing a smile. 'Of course. We all have our responsibilities. Safe travels.'

grateful_for_help.text: Elena's tension eases slightly. 'That's kind of you. Even small gestures mean a lot when you're worried. Thank you.'

discuss_arrangement.text: Elena considers carefully. 'I could offer you something in return for better priority. I still have some connections from my time as a scribe. Would information about the merchant schedules help?'

explain_contents.text: Elena hesitates before answering. 'It's a response to a proposal. The kind that changes lives. I'd rather not say more, but timing matters greatly in such things.'

addInformation.text: Elena has a life-changing letter that needs careful timing

calmed_somewhat.text: Elena's shoulders relax. 'You mean that? Thank you. It's been hard to trust anyone lately, but something about you seems different. I believe you'll keep your word.'
